result.execSummary:
The defendant Robin A Schmid was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • OWI (5th or 6th), a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Any vehicle T&R in defendants name, as is defendant himself.

miscConds.notes:
Assessment/counseling as deemed appropriate by agent. 

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  

A copy of the police report has been faxed to the probation office.

timeConds.notes: with huber for work or treatment if defendant qualifies under jail criteria

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 11:30 am 
State appears by ADA Sid Brubacher; Deft appears in person, pro se. 
COURT questions parties regarding PSI. No additions or corrections to PSI. 
Deft makes statement. 
COURT ORDERS: SWH for 3 years probation - CONDITIONS: $2252 inclusive; 6 months MCJ with huber for work or treatment if deft qualifies under jail criteria; Any vehicle titled or registered in the defendant's name is subject to IID for 36 months, as is the defendant himself; 36 months dl revocation; AODA; absolute sobriety; assessment/counseling as deemed appropriate by the dept. 
COURT finds deft is entitled to 39 days credit. 
State returns copy of PSI. 
COURT notes PSI will be sealed. 
Deft makes statement.

Case Called: 9:35 am 
State appears by ADA Sid Brubacher; Def appears in person, pro se. 
COURT advises def regarding right to an attorney. 

WAIVER OF PRELIMINARY HEARING. 
Waiver of Prelim. filed.  
Court questions deft as to waiver.
Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily made.
COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial.  
Information filed. Reading Waived. 

PLEA HEARING. 
Plea Quest/Waiver of Right to Atty filed. 
PLEA: Ct. 1 (OWI 5th)>>NO CONTEST. 
COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, def is competent to represent self, a factual basis, & def guilty. 
State makes statement. Def makes statement. 
COURT revokes bond and orders def to be taken into custody immediately. 
COURT ORDERS: PSI. 
Sentencing set for 6/2/2014 at 11:30 am in Br. 3.
